description.value: When the Carrion King rolls initiative, an area of living fungus appears in a close burst 5 and remains until the end of the encounter. The area is difficult terrain for enemies. If a creature makes an area or close attack that includes this area, the creature can target the Carrion King.

If the Carrion King starts his turn unable to take actions, drop the body recharges, and the Carrion King can use it as no action. If the Carrion King does so, unless he spends an action point, he can take only a minor action and a standard action that turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ necrotic, poison

Standard

Attack: Melee 2 (one creature)

+25 vs. AC

Hit: 3d8 + 16 necrotic and poison damage, and the Carrion King slides the target up to 4 squares.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ necrotic, poison

Standard

Attack: Ranged 20 (one creature)

+23 vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d10 + 18 necrotic and poison damage, and the target falls prone.

At-Will

Standard

Effect: The Carrion King makes two basic attacks.

Encounter ✦ necrotic, poison

Standard

Attack: Close burst 2 (enemies in the burst)

+23 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 4d8 + 18 necrotic and poison damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).

Encounter

Move

Effect: Close burst 1; the burst creates a zone of fungal growth that lasts until the end of the Carrion King's next turn. Any creature that enters or starts its turn in the zone is dazed while the zone persists. After the Carrion King creates the zone, he is removed from play, harmful effects on him end, and he reappears in a space in the fungal bed area.

At-Will 1/round

Minor

Attack: Ranged 20 (one creature)

+23 vs. Will

Hit: The target moves up to its speed toward its nearest ally, then makes an at-will attack against the ally.

Encounter

Triggered

Trigger: The Carrion King is first bloodied.

Effect (No Action): Drop the body recharges, and the Carrion King uses it. Instead of reappearing in his Huge form, he reappears in three Large bodies. Each body has 100 hit points, lacks the Carrion King's traits and encounter powers, and is considered to be bloodied.

system.biography:
HP 388; Bloodied 194
Resist 20 necrotic, 20 poison 		Init +16 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 34Fort 33Ref 31Will 32
Speed 7, burrow 7, climb 7
Ability ScoresStr 23 (+16)
Con 26 (+18)		Dex 22 (+16)
Int 20 (+15)		Wis 22 (+16)
Cha 25 (+17)
Languages Common, Elven, Primordial, telepathy 20
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Arcana +20, Insight +21Senses
Passive Perception 26 | Insight 31

Traits

[[/roll 0#<p style="background-color:green;color:white;"> <b>Fungal Bed</b> <b></b></p><p>When the Carrion King rolls initiative, an area of living fungus appears in a close burst 5 and remains until the end of the encounter. The area is difficult terrain for enemies. If a creature makes an area or close attack that includes this area, the creature can target the Carrion King.</p>]] Fungal Bed

When the Carrion King rolls initiative, an area of living fungus appears in a close burst 5 and remains until the end of the encounter. The area is difficult terrain for enemies. If a creature makes an area or close attack that includes this area, the creature can target the Carrion King.

[[/roll 0#<p style="background-color:green;color:white;"> <b>Unstoppable</b> <b></b></p><p>If the Carrion King starts his turn unable to take actions, drop the body recharges, and the Carrion King can use it as no action. If the Carrion King does so, unless he spends an action point, he can take only a minor action and a standard action that turn.</p>]] Unstoppable

If the Carrion King starts his turn unable to take actions, drop the body recharges, and the Carrion King can use it as no action. If the Carrion King does so, unless he spends an action point, he can take only a minor action and a standard action that turn.

Standard

Hit: [[/roll 3d8 + 16#<p style="background-color:green;color:white;">(⚔) <b>Slam</b> (necrotic, poison) ✦ <b>At-Will</b></p><p><i>Hit:</i> 3d8 + 16 necrotic and poison damage, and the Carrion King slides the target up to 4 squares.</p>]] <29.5> necrotic and poison damage, and the Carrion King slides the target up to 4 squares.

Each body has 100 hit points, lacks the Carrion King’s traits and encounter powers, and is considered to be bloodied.</p>]] Spreading Rebirth ✦ Encounter

Trigger: The Carrion King is first bloodied.

Effect (No Action): Drop the body recharges, and the Carrion King uses it. Instead of reappearing in his Huge form, he reappears in three Large bodies. Each body has 100 hit points, lacks the Carrion King’s traits and encounter powers, and is considered to be bloodied.
